mapper.select: select sprint_year, max(sprint_no) + 1 as sprint_no from sprint left join project on sprint.project_id = project.project_id where sprint_year = YEAR(now()) and sprint.project_id = #{project_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sprint(sprint_year, sprint_no, sprint_goal, project_id) VALUES (#{sprint_year},#{sprint_no},#{sprint_goal}, #{project_id})
mapper.select: select sprint_year, sprint_no,sprint_status ,project_name from sprint left join project on sprint.project_id = project.project_id where sprint.project_id = #{project_id}
